aaka්ramanashilithwaya awama kirima pilibandawa athi wadasatahan pilibandawa salaka balana wita eewaye wiwidha pa්rabheda daknata labe. 1ga	atham eewa aaka්ramanashilithwaya ma`gaharima thulin warapa්rasada langa kara ganna wadasatahan 2ga	atham eewa aaka්ramanashilithwayata padaka wana apa්rasanna hangim saha urana sithuwili ma`gaharawana wadasatahan 3ga	samahara wadasatan aaka්ramanashilithwayata danduwam karayi. 4ga	aaka්ramanashilithwaya palanaya karanne kesedayi wataha dena wadasatahanda weyi.

pura wasara 40ka sewa kalayak nimakirimen anathuruwa kaluthara adhyapana kalapaye sahakara adhyapana adhyakshika (sangitha) ech. ke. di. kalyani dhammika mahathmiya pasugiyada wishrama labuwaya.aya bhathkande sangitha upadhiya, maharagama adhyapana aayathana - adhyapanawedi upadhiya da (sangitha) labaganimin giragama guru widuhala sangitha puhunu guruwariyakada washayen sangitha diwiya thula kadaim pasukara thibe.1974 warshayedi walimada - bambaarapana gambada widuhalaka sangitha guruwariyaka lesa siya rajakariya arambau kalyani dhammika mahathmiya 1979 warshayedi uggalbada maha widyalaye sangitha guruwariyaka lesa pathwa ema widyalayata sangitha anshayen samastha lanka mattamin usas jayagrahana himikaradimata katayuthu kalaya.1990 warshayedi kaluthara balika widyalaye sangitha guruwariyaka lesath 1993 warshayedi kaluthara kalapa adhyapana karyalaye peradiga sangitha guru upadeshakawariyaka lesath katayuthu kirimata ayata awasthawa himi wuwaya.pasugiyada siya 40 wasaraka sewa kalayakin anathuruwa wishrama giya kaluthara adhyapana kalapaye sahakara adhyapana adhyakshika (sangitha) ech. ke. di. kalyani dhammika mahathmiya sangitha kshethrayata guruwarun, widuhalpathiwarun athulu wishala pirisak dayada kara thibe..
dan lankaweda nathinam aapahu giyada, sabith?
